title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
